      • getParentName

        public java.lang.String getParentName()
        The parent name.
        Returns:
        the parent name, or null if this class has no parent

      • addField

        public boolean addField(java.lang.String id,
                        Type type)
        Add a new field declaration.
        Parameters:
        id - the field name
        type - the field type
        Returns:
        true if the field was added, false if this class already contains a field declaration with the given name (does NOT check for existing declarations in ancestor classes)

      • getFieldType

        public Type getFieldType(java.lang.String name)
        The type for a named field.
        Parameters:
        name - the field name
        Returns:
        the type of the field if this class includes a field declaration with the given name, null otherwise (does NOT look for inherited fields)

      • getImmediateFieldCount

        public int getImmediateFieldCount()
        The number of fields declared in this class signature (does NOT include inherited fields)
        Returns:
        the number of fields declared in this class signature

      • getImmediateFieldNames

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getImmediateFieldNames()
        This list of field names declared in this class signature.
        Returns:
        the list of field names declared in this class signature (does NOT include inherited fields) // * @see SymbolTable.getAllFieldNames()

      • addMethod

        public boolean addMethod(java.lang.String methodName,
                         Type type,
                         java.util.List<Type> formalTypes,
                         MethodDecl methodDecl)
        Add a new method signature to the class signature.
        Parameters:
        methodName - the method name
        type - the method return type (null for procedures)
        formalTypes - the list of parameter types
        methodDecl - the method declaration AST
        Returns:
        true if the signature was added, false if a signature with the given name was already present (does NOT check ancestor classes)

      • getMethodSignature

        public MethodSignature getMethodSignature(java.lang.String id)
        The signature for a named method declared in this class signature.
        Parameters:
        id - the method name
        Returns:
        the signature for the given method name, or null if this class does not declare a method with the given name (does NOT check for inherited methods)

      • getImmediateMethodNames

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getImmediateMethodNames()
        This list of method names declared in this class signature.
        Returns:
        the list of method names declared in this class signature (does NOT include inherited methods)
